4. Documentation: are you using a reference manager such as Zotero or annotation tools like NVivo? Please contact the RDM helpdesk if you like to learn more about tools that may help you with data management. 
5. Storage: would it not be easier and safer to use one KU Leuven storage solution with automatic backup? Onedrive for example which is already included in your office 365 subscription. To select the most suitable storage see https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/nl
